title: Interpretation of drowning in a dream: Seeing drowning in a dream

preview.html: The dream of drowning is for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman. She either drowns in the river, in the sea, in the pool, and comes out of it and lives, or she dies with the child. Drowning or saving someone from drowning, according to Ibn Sirin and others. A dream about the sea as a symbol and sign of drowning is not always bad, but rather it can be an indication of goodness for its owner, such as a student, it can be a sign of success, excellence, and genius in his field and knowledge, as well as a merchant getting closer to God and increasing obedience. And good deeds, and among these interpretations are the following: Interpretation of drowning in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he has drowned, then he is in Hell; For the sake of the words of God Almighty: Whoever dreams that he is drowning will commit many sins, and if he dies while drowning, then he will sin. He is afraid of disbelief or drowning in heresy. Whoever goes out and does not sink, then his worldly affairs will lead to the integrity of his religion, and if he wears a green garment, he will attain knowledge and piety. And if he drowns and dives to the bottom of the sea, the Sultan will become angry with him or torture him and he will die in this torture. And whoever sees an infidel drowning in the sea, he will believe in the words of God Almighty: (Until drowning drowns him. He said: There is no god but the One in whom the Children of Israel believe, and I am one of the Muslims.) . Whoever sees that he died drowned in water is almost his enemy. And drowning in clean water drowns in a lot of money. Whoever dreams and dreams that he died by drowning, then he is in hellfire; Because God Almighty said (They have drowned in their sins, so enter the Fire). If a person dreams that he is drowning, it means that he will commit many sins, and if he dies, he will die in disbelief. Whoever dreams that he is drowning in the sea believes and approaches God Almighty, according to the words of God Almighty (until death overcomes him He said: “I believe that there is no god but Him in whom the children of Israel believed, and I am one of the Muslims.” Whoever dreams that he is drowning and reaches the bottom of the sea, this means that his boss will become very angry with him and will torture him until death. Interpretation of drowning in a dream by Ibn SirinWho dreams that he drowned and dived into the sea , the Sultan will destroy him, as he died by drowning in the water, and his enemy almost drowned in the clear waters, drowning in a lot of money. Drowning is not good, because God Almighty drowned the people of Noah, Pharaoh, and others. It explains, for example: For the student, increasing the depth of knowledge and experience in the specialty As for the merchant, the sea can be the market in which he works, and for the sinner and sinner, it can be a basin. Of repentance. Interpretation of drowning in a dream according to Nabulus. Whoever dreams of drowning is in Hell, according to the Almighty’s saying: {They have been drowned for their sins, so enter the Fire} and whoever dreams of drowning is committing many sins. If he wears green clothes, then he will gain knowledge and piety, and if he drowns and dives into the sea, then the Sultan will become angry with him or torture him and he will die in this torment. I am one of the Muslims} And whoever sees that he has died, he drowns in the water as his enemy, and he drowns in pure water, drowns in a lot of money. Interpretation of drowning in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Whoever dreams that he drowned in the sea and then survived, then he drowns in worldly affairs and sorrows, then gets rid of them. The world, according to some Arabs, has drowned in bliss. Interpretation of drowning in the sea in a dream. This type of dream is very common and has interesting interpretations.

title: Interpretation of a dream about white hair

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing white hair in a dream: It should be noted that it is undesirable to see white hair in young people, because it indicates anxiety and sadness. It is a sign of aging, as well as many dreams that can bring good and evil, according to the interpretation. . About the dreamer and the circumstances in which the dreamer lives, and this is what we refer to in this article, as the article refers to some scholars’ interpretations of seeing white hair in a dream for an unmarried and divorced woman. A woman’s dream in particular is disturbing to her, as women become pessimistic about it when it appears in reality as in dreams. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dream Interpretation of seeing white hair in a dream We also explain below the interpretation of this dream and its meanings in Ibn Sirin’s dream, which is as follows If the dreamer sees in a dream that his hair is white when he is old, this indicates the respect he enjoys among people. It also indicates the special status and dignity that the Lord enjoys among those around him. Seeing white hair in a dream symbolizes longevity and respect. It also indicates the return of an absent person or a traveler. If a woman dreams of performing Hajj and her hair is white, this indicates kindness and respect for religion and knowledge. If one is rich and sees his hair white in the dream, this indicates money. Also, the whiter the hair, the more money and more. Read More: Interpretation of seeing an old man in a dreamInterpretation of seeing white hair in a dream for a single womanHaving previously learned about the interpretation of seeing white hair in a dream, we will then discuss an explanation of the interpretation of this vision for a single woman, which is as follows: If an unmarried girl sees white hair in a dream, this It portends evil, because seeing the white hair of a young person in a dream is an unpleasant vision. Here it is old age and expresses the inability to achieve ambitions. Also, white hair in one dream indicates poverty, anxiety, and sins that she commits. It also indicates illness, so if the fiancée sees In her dream, gray hair indicates her marriage soon. If she sees that she is dyeing her hair in a dream, this indicates her future marriage. The more white hair there is in the dream, the less bad it is, and this is a good sign. Interpretation of seeing white hair in a dream for a married womanThe following is a description of the interpretation of seeing white hair In a dream for a married woman, it indicates many different connotations, which are as follows: If a married woman dreams that her hair is white, or her husband’s hair is fair, then this indicates wealth, happiness, and many good things in her life. Also, white hair in a dream for a married woman indicates Her husband's success in professional life, as he has become his wife's pride. If the wife suffers from her husband and he treats her badly, and she sees white hair in her dream, this indicates her husband's mistreatment and betrayal. It also symbolizes seeing her husband cheating or marrying her secretly if she sees that white hair In the front of the head. If she sees these white hairs on her body and scalp, this indicates a lot of debt

title: Escaping from the police in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from the police in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is escaping from the police in a dream, this dream may indicate her fear of the future and her escape from thinking about marriage. Seeing the same single woman in a dream escaping from the police and in reality she is afraid of them, may This indicates that she has fallen into some problems that threaten her safety. But if an unmarried girl dreams of this dream and the truth is that she is looking at the police with security, this may indicate her imminent marriage and that she will feel safe and stable. Seeing a single girl in a dream may indicate that she is escaping from the police To the greatness of her position among people and her family members. If a single girl sees herself running away from a policeman asking for her card or passport, this may mean that she will obtain a great advantage or a promotion at work. But if she sees that she is marrying a policeman, this vision may be evidence. On her marriage, not a person of status and a lot of money. See also: Interpretation of a dream of escaping from someone by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a woman escaping from the police in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is escaping from the police in a dream, this may be evidence that she is thinking a lot about the future. Her family and is trying to ensure a happy life for her. However, if a married woman sees the police entering her home, it can show you that she will enjoy a great source of livelihood, and if she works, she will get a promotion or a raise. Seeing a married woman running away from the police in a dream and in reality was She is afraid of them. This may indicate her anxiety about her married life or her husband’s financial circumstances. But if a married woman sees that the police are chasing her in a dream and she is not afraid, this indicates the strength of her faith and trust in God. A wife sees the police chasing her husband in a dream. This may indicate Her husband not performing his duties at work and she must warn him. If a married woman dreams that the police are taking her children, this may indicate her future greatness and academic excellence. Escaping from the police in a dream for a married woman may indicate getting rid of fears and the death of the material problems that occupy her mind. Interpretation of a dream Escaping from the police in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that she is escaping from the police in her dream, this dream may indicate that she is afraid of the birth process. It may also indicate her fear of the fetus and fear of harming it, but there is no need to worry because seeing escaping from the police is safety and reassurance. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from the police for a pregnant woman. It may indicate that she is pregnant with a boy and that she will give birth safely and that God will protect her and her child. But if she dreams that the police are chasing her in her home, this may indicate that she feels safe and stable with her husband. Seeing the police may indicate for a woman Pregnant in a dream indicates her need for security and a stronger relationship with cows, especially during pregnancy and the problems she is going through. Seeing him escaping from the police in a dream for a pregnant woman may indicate that her newly born child will reach a great status in old age and will be one of the most successful and distinguished. He may tk

title: Interpretation of a dream about a tiger

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream: The tiger is a predatory animal, so it poses a danger in reality if it is in an unprotected place, and therefore seeing a tiger can always be a reflection of the anxiety and fear that the viewer actually feels. She is married or pregnant, but we remind the readers of the site that the interpretations we provide are interpretations of her own vision only, and that replacing this interpretation with any other vision is not a correct matter and is prohibited by everyone. Interpretation of dream scholars, because the interpretation of a dream requires knowledge of many aspects that are not the case, as it depends only on Visual vision.Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The researcher in the field of dream interpretation, Ibn Sirin, says that a tiger in a dream shows courage and strength and can also be a sign of success in work. But if a tiger is seen in a dream in an animal cage, this may indicate that people People with vision are in danger. Also, if you dream that you are drinking tiger milk, this may be an indication of the presence of competitors or hostility towards the current person, and God knows best. As for the dream of buying a wild tiger, this may indicate that the individual has a vision and it may also indicate that The dreamer has friends in prominent positions. Seeing a tiger in a dream for a single woman. A single girl who sees a tiger in a dream, this may mean that the girl is in a romantic relationship. If you see a tiger skin in an unmarried woman’s dream, it means dowry. Seeing a tiger in a dream for a married woman indicates a woman A married woman who sees a tiger in a dream indicates a strong relationship with her wife. Also, seeing a calm tiger in a married woman’s dream indicates a happy and stable family life - God willing. In addition to seeing a married woman in a dream hugging a tiger or playing with a tiger, this may be a sign of... She will become pregnant soon. Seeing a tiger in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees a tiger in a dream may be an indication that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Also, seeing a tiger in a pregnant woman’s dream may be an indication of the husband’s interest in her and the love he feels for his wife. However, if a pregnant woman dreams that she hears the voice of a tiger, this may be an indication of bad news that the woman will hear during the coming period, God forbid. Seeing a pet tiger in a dream. If a dream appears about a pet tiger that was purchased inside the house, this is a sign that the dreamer will meet friends. Sincerely. Also, if you dream of a tiger playing with a pet, this can indicate happiness, joy, and luck that supports the dreamer, and God knows best. As for seeing a female white tiger in a dream, this indicates that the woman who dreams has a strong vision and is a skilled lady who can deal with Family members and organizing family affairs properly, and God knows best.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a spider by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about a spider: Seeing a spider in reality is often associated with ruin and destruction, as it is found in unclean houses or where people left them long ago, so dreaming about a spider does not leave a good impression on the dreamer and arouses their curiosity about the different meanings and connotations related to this dream and its wonders. If it brings him good or evil, we will learn all of this and much more in the following lines of the article. Interpretation of a dream about a spider: There are many interpretations related to seeing a spider in a dream, the most important of which are what is clear as follows: Seeing a spider in a dream symbolizes broken families or distress, and if One dreams of a spider entering the house, then this is a sign of disputes and disputes between the members of that house. If one dreams of a spider leaving the house, this is a sign of positive changes that will soon occur in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a large spider during sleep means that the dreamer will be surrounded by a treacherous person And strong and powerful, he uses it for evil and harming people. As for someone who dreams of a poisonous spider, this indicates problems that arise between friends or members of the same family with each other due to the presence of a malicious person among them. Interpretation of a dream about a spider by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned in the interpretation of a dream. Spider: If someone sees a spider in a dream, this is a sign that he is surrounded by corrupt people who seek to harm him or discredit him among people and do not wish him well at all, so he should be very careful. If during sleep you see a spider spinning its threads, This proves that the dreamer is an abnormal person who always seeks to harm those around him. If you see a spider web in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer’s wife is not good and that people do not love her because of her bad treatment towards them. When a man dreams of a spider in his bed, this symbolizes the woman’s alienation and disobedience. In general, seeing a spider in a dream proves that the dreamer has gone through many crises and obstacles in his life, for which he could not find solutions. Spider in a dream Learn about the most important interpretations that Dr. Fahd Al-Usaimi received about seeing a spider in a dream: Seeing a spider in a dream According to Al-Osaimi, it indicates that he is surrounded by treacherous and malicious personalities who are conspiring against him and trying to distort his reputation among the people. Watching the slaughter of a spider during sleep, removing its webs and getting rid of it leads to the end of the difficult periods that a person goes through in his life and the removal of the worries and sorrows that afflict his chest. Whoever sees the demolition of a spider’s web in a dream This is a sign of the improvement of his situation and the positive changes that will occur in his life that will allow him to live in peace and psychological comfort. Interpretation of a dream about a spider for a single woman: Seeing spider webs in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the end of her engagement or separation from her lover soon, which will cause her to enter a bad psychological state. If she dreams The girl with spider webs on the walls of the house, this is a sign that she and her family members will suffer from a difficult situation in the coming period. When

title: Interpretation of the dream of buying a car in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying a car in a dream: Individuals experience many dreams during their sleep, some of which are fleeting dreams caused by Satan, and some of which are like a vision or a message from the Lord of the Worlds to the righteous. Servants, where the dream carries an idea or a future event that will occur, is heading towards him. Many scholars, sheikhs and translators have worked on the interpretation of dreams, including the scholar Ibn Sirin, Sheikh Ibn Baz and others, and people usually search for an interpretation of these dreams, such as the interpretation of a dream about buying a car in a dream and dreams. Others that a person goes through in his life. Interpretation of the dream of buying a car for singles. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of the dream of buying a car in a dream for singles, as the interpretation of buying a car for singles has many connotations, depending on the car and its type. Below is the interpretation of the dream of buying a car for singles. Singles: It indicates marriage in the near future to a man who is very wonderful in his dealings and morals and you will live a happy life with him. If the car is beautiful and very elegant, you will marry a rich man. If the car is old and poor, it means marrying a poor man. Interpretation of a dream about buying a black car Mostly What people dream of is that they bought a car in a dream, and the interpretation is usually due to the color of the car, because the interpretation of the dream of buying a black car in a dream shows many clues, the most important of which are: Moving from poverty to great wealth. Finding a new job and halal and abundant living. Evidence of ending Worries and entering into a new life full of happiness. If you are going to buy a new car, the interpretation indicates that you bought a black car. Interpretation of the dream of buying a white car: Some people dream that they bought a white car in a dream, and this usually brings goodness to the dreamer and this is due to his social status, It varies between single, married, or poor. Here is the interpretation of the dream of buying a white car in a dream: If the dreamer is poor, then the dream means an abundance of goodness and abundance from God Almighty. If the dreamer is an unmarried girl, this means that she will wear white and soon marry a man she loves. If the dreamer is pregnant, then this It indicates that this child is a girl. If the dreamer is married, this indicates an improvement in the marital relationship with his life partner and understanding between them away from problems and disagreements. title: Interpretation of seeing Paradise in a dream: Entering Paradise in a dream

preview.html: Good news: Whoever sees that he is in Paradise, on the authority of the unmarried woman, the married woman, and the pregnant woman, according to Ibn Sirin, I dreamed that I entered Paradise, and I saw the dead person saying: “I am in Paradise.” Interpretation of the sky in a dream. Seeing Paradise and its general bliss in a dream is a good vision and predicts the dreamer’s good condition. He saw in his dream Paradise and the bliss that he adorns himself with but is unable to enter it. His vision indicates the good and good deeds that the dreamer actually performs. Or it indicates the end of worries and distress and the coming of comfort that the dreamer awaits in reality. What is also indicated in the interpretation of this situation is that it indicates To achieve the desired goal and fulfillment with certainty. Desires sought by the dreamer in reality. The gate to heaven in a dream refers to one of the parents in reality. The person who sees in his dream that heaven has two gates and the dreamer is free to enter through any of these gates, then his vision shows the parents his approval. In real life. If these two doors are closed in front of the dreamer in a dream and prevent him from entering Paradise, then the dream indicates the anger of this person’s parents and his disobedience to them in reality. In the event that a person sees that there is a door to Paradise but it is closed to the dreamer in a dream, then the dream It indicates the death of one of the parents while he is awake, but if they are closed together, the vision indicates the death of both of them. From what was said about seeing entering Paradise in a dream to the approaching period and the time of exit to the afterlife, it was also said to indicate repentance from sins and disobedience. Whoever sees in his dream that one If the dreamer is ordered to enter Paradise and does not enter it in the dream, then his dream indicates the corruption of his religion and the possibility of leaving it. Whoever sees in his dream that he enters Paradise with a smiling face, His vision indicates that he is reassured in reality because of the frequent remembrance of God Almighty. Those who remember God are the happiest and most satisfied people on the face of the earth. And whoever sees that he enters Paradise carrying a sword, then he is righteous, enjoining what is right and forbidding what is wrong. Whoever drinks from its water, juice, and wine, will gain wisdom and dignity, and it was said: from money that harms God, but if The fortune teller was forbidden from eating these fruits or drinking this water and juices in heaven. Seeing it indicates corruption and lack of religion. Interpretation of Paradise in a dream by Ibn Sirino. Whoever sees Paradise in a dream but does not enter it, it may foretell good news for the dreamer, the reason for which may be that he intended or intended to do good. Whoever dreams as if he saw Paradise as it is, this is good news for achieving the goal, achieving the goal, and removing worries. And rest. Whoever dreams of being prevented from entering Paradise indicates the impossibility of Hajj or Jihad, or that he cannot repent of sin or disobedience. Whoever dreams that the door of heaven is open and he enters through any door he wants, this indicates the approval of the parents. Seeing the door of heaven closed indicates the death of one of the parents. It may indicate the death of one of the parents. Seeing two of the gates of Paradise closed leads to the death of the parents. As for seeing all the gates of Paradise closed and not open to him, perhaps this indicates the dissatisfaction of the parent.
preview.text: Good news: Whoever sees that he is in heaven, about the unmarried, married, and pregnant woman, according to Ibn Sirin, I dreamed that I entered heaven, and I saw the dead saying: “I am in heaven.” Interpretation of heaven in a dream Seeing heaven and its general bliss in a dream is a good vision and predicts the good condition of the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream heaven and the bliss that adorns it and cannot enter it, his vision indicates the righteous and good deeds that the dreamer actually offers. Or it indicates the end of worries and distress and the coming of the comfort that the dreamer awaits in reality, and what is also indicated in the interpretation of this case is that it indicates the achievement of the desired and the fulfillment of certainty. The desires that the dreamer sought in wakefulness. And the gate of heaven in a dream refers to one of the parents in reality, so the person who sees in his dream that heaven has two gates and the dreamer is free to enter from any of these gates, his vision shows his parents his approval. In real life. If these two doors are closed in front of the dreamer in a dream and prevent him from entering heaven, then the dream indicates the anger of the parents of this person and his disobedience to them in reality. In the event that a person sees that there is a door to heaven but it is closed in front of the dreamer in a dream, then the dream indicates the death of one of the parents while he is awake, but if they are closed together, the vision indicates the death of both of them. What has been said about seeing entering heaven in a dream indicates the approaching period and the time of exiting to the afterlife, it has also been said that it indicates repentance from sins and disobedience. Whoever sees in his dream that one of the people he knows has imagined him in heaven, then the dream shows the repentance and guidance that he receives from his hands in reality. If the dreamer is ordered to enter heaven and does not enter it in the dream, then his dream indicates the corruption of his religion and the possibility of leaving it. And whoever sees in his dream that he enters heaven with a smiling face, then his vision indicates that he is reassured in reality due to the abundance of remembrance of God Almighty. Those who remember God are the happiest and most contented people on earth. And whoever sees that he enters Paradise carrying a sword, he is a righteous person who enjoins what is right and forbids what is wrong. Whoever drinks from its water, juice and wine, he gains wisdom and dignity, and it was said: from the money that harms God, but if the fortune teller forbids eating these fruits or drinking this water and juices in Paradise. And seeing it indicates corruption and lack of religion. Interpretation of Paradise in a dream by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees Paradise in a dream and does not enter it may foretell good news for the dreamer, the reason for which may be that he intended to do good or intended it. Whoever dreams that he saw Paradise as it is, this is good news for achieving the goal and achieving the goal and removing worries and comfort. Whoever dreams of being prevented from entering Paradise indicates the impossibility of Hajj or Jihad, or that he cannot repent from sin or disobedience. Whoever dreams that the door of heaven is open and enters from any door he wants, this indicates the approval of the parents. Seeing the door of heaven closed indicates the death of one of the parents. Seeing two of the doors of Paradise locked may indicate the death of the parents. As for seeing all the doors of Paradise closed and closed and not open to him, this may indicate the dissatisfaction of the parents.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a small boat Seeing a boat in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a boat in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man riding a small boat on the river driving the ship. The ship and the boat were sunk by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq and more. A boat in a dream is one of the strange dreams that we see constantly to think and want to travel abroad, and many people like to drive. Boats, pleasure boats or direct travel, and ships, boats or boats, are among the oldest means of transportation in history that appeared at the beginning of human life, and which began to spread widely and develop in the current era. We will explain to you in our article today the interpretation of seeing a boat in a dream as explained by the famous translator. Ibn Sirin in his interpretations.Interpretation of a boat in a dream: Seeing a boat or ship in a dream is one of the visions that can be interpreted for good or bad, and this depends on the nature of the dream and the dreamer’s circumstances. It is said that if one dreams of a boat, boat, or ship on land, this may mean that he will escape a certain danger, and it is also said that if one dreams of towing a ship on land, this could indicate that he has some qualities of hypocrisy, and among them are those who said: If he sees in A dream or a dream that he has the best people with him on board or in a boat, then this may be out of obedience or guidance, and they said: He dreams that he is on a boat at sea, then this indicates obedience or guidance, until he reaches a high rank or a prestigious position. In addition to What was mentioned, some scholars and translators said that if one sees in a dream a ship and a boat, it is possible that this dream is a sign of imprisonment or illness, and some of them also said: If one sees in one’s dream that the ship is sinking, it is possible that this dream is evidence. On salvation, some of them added and said: If a person sees an empty and empty ship in his dream, this may indicate a profit in trade and money. Interpretation of a boat in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing an empty boat in a dream is evidence of profit in trade. Driving a boat full of people in a dream is Evidence of safety on the journey. Seeing a boat in a dream is evidence of recovering from illness and obtaining good and great happiness. Riding a boat in a dream also means getting rid of drought or worry and anxiety in life. Seeing a ship or boat on land in a dream is a sign of survival. Driving a boat with righteous people in a dream is evidence that God will forgive all sins. Getting out of a boat in a dream is a sign of the survival of enemies. Seeing a solitary person riding a boat or boat in a dream is evidence that he will assume the command of one of the kings. Interpretation of riding a boat in a dream The dreamer who is riding Riding a boat in a dream is evidence of comfort and survival in life. Riding a large ship in a dream is evidence of abundant livelihood in the same year. Riding a boat with friends and family in a dream is a sign of kindness, honor, and beauty. Riding a boat in a dream with friends also means escaping enemies. Riding A boat and walking quietly in a dream is a sign of kindness. Riding a boat with dead people in a dream is evidence of salvation from the temptations of this world. Seeing a boat is...

title: The meaning of the interpretation of olives in a dream for a married and unmarried woman, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of olives in a dream for a married and single woman: Olives are considered one of the fatty fruits that have countless benefits, and from them we extract olive oil, which has many nutritional benefits, and it is also used to treat many diseases. ) God Almighty has spoken the truth. Today and until today, we will talk about the interpretation of olives in a dream for a married and single woman. So what did scholars explain this vision? Interpretation of olives in a dream for a married and unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin: Seeing olives in a dream, as interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin, sometimes indicates good and sometimes bad. And this is in the vision. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of olives in a married woman’s dream as a sign of the imminence of pregnancy, and God knows best. As for the dream of an unmarried woman, it promises her that she will marry a man of good morals and religion, that her financial condition is good, and that she will live a happy married life with him. As he interpreted Ibn Sirin saw a person seeing olives in a dream, and the dreamer was sick and ate those olives. This indicates the nearness of his recovery from his illness, and God knows best. He also interpreted, in general, seeing olives in a man’s and woman’s dream as evidence of stability, security, and happiness. Interpretation of olives in a dream for a single girl: If a single girl dreams of seeing olives in a dream, this means that she is about to Achieving her ambitions and goals. If an unmarried girl dreams of green olives in a dream and that she is eating them, this indicates a close marriage with a person of good morals and religion. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is picking olives, this indicates an upcoming opportunity for her that she must take advantage of, and God knows best. Interpretation of olives in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams of olives in a dream, this means that her husband is righteous and that his morals are beautiful and good. Also, a married woman’s dream of olives in a dream portends an imminent pregnancy and may indicate that the dreamer is in good health. If a married woman dreams that she She picks olives in a dream, it means that she will receive good news in the near future. Interpretation of olives in a dream for a pregnant woman: After interpreting olives in a dream for a married and unmarried woman, we will talk about the dream of olives for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams of olives in a dream, this means That the time of her birth is approaching and that she will give birth to a healthy child. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing olives in a dream and their color is yellow, then this is a disgusting dream and may indicate the loss of the fetus, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is buying olives, this indicates kindness and that she will live a happy life with her husband and give birth to offspring. Good, and God knows best. Interpretation of olives in a dream for a young man: If a young man dreams of green olives in a dream, this means that he will get a promotion at work. But if an unmarried young man dreams that he is eating green olives in a dream, this indicates the approaching marriage of his beautiful girl. Morals and religion. If a young man dreams that he is climbing an olive tree, this indicates the problems that the dreamer is going through and that will end. Interpretation of olives in a dream for a married man: Seeing olives in a married man’s dream indicates the fulfillment of his dreams and aspirations, and God knows best. Visions
